data: Mrs. Hayne | Market Street | San Francisco | Twin Peaks
Mrs. Hayne's boarding-house | Market Street | cross streets | San Francisco | Twin Peaks | wharves | bay

Mrs. Hayneâ€™s boarding-house stood on the corner of Market Street and one of those cross streets which seem to leap down from the heights of San Francisco and empty themselves into the great central thoroughfare that roars from the sandy desert at the base of Twin Peaks to the teeming wharves on the edge of the bay.
